h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Loong Scales Location
content: To defeat the First Prince of Flowing Sands, you will need to obtain the Pungent Flesh Chunk from defeating the King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince in Sandgate Village. This is a mandatory boss, so you can't miss them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loong_Scales.md', within the main section titled 'Loong Scales', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Loong Scales Location'.
The content is as follows:
To defeat the First Prince of Flowing Sands, you will need to obtain the Pungent Flesh Chunk from defeating the King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince in Sandgate Village. This is a mandatory boss, so you can't miss them.
